mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT A JOIN USER_PROJECT B ON(A.PROJ_NO = B.PROJ_NO) WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT PROJ_NO ,TITLE ,STARTDATE ,ENDDATE , ,NOTICE ,NOTICE_CONT ,UPDATEDATE , ,INTRO ,DOC_CONT_NO ,LIKE_COUNT FROM project WHERE PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
SELECT TAG_NAME FROM PROJ_TAG WHERE PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
UPDATE PROJECT SET NOTICE = #{notice}, NOTICE_CONT = #{noticeCont}, UPDATEDATE = sysdate WHERE PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (PROJ_NO, TITLE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, PRIVACY, INTRO) VALUES (#{projNo},#{title},#{startdate},#{enddate},#{privacy},#{intro})
INSERT INTO USER_PROJECT (USER_ID, PROJ_NO, ROLE) VALUES (#{userId},#{projNo},#{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT SET TITLE = #{title}, PRIVACY = #{privacy}, STARTDATE = #{startdate}, ENDDATE = #{enddate}, INTRO = #{intro} WHERE PROJ_NO = #{projNo}
